articles.title: Shooting at Texas high school prom party leaves 9 teens injured - India Today
articles.description: As many as nine teens were injured after gunmen fired at an after-prom party in Jasper, Texas. The incident comes a week after four people were shot dead and 32 wounded at an Alabama "Sweet 16" birthday party.
